channel.title: CVE Feed for Chitubox -- Chitubox Basic
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Chitubox -- Chitubox Basic

item.title: CVE-2021-21948|2024-09-16T18:24:19.281Z -- chitubox -- chitubox%20basic
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the readDatHeadVec functionality of AnyCubic Chitubox AnyCubic Plugin 1.0.0. A specially-crafted GF file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
